jollyRoger: Nine snake symbols arranged in a pattern

keyMoments.description: The Kuja Pirates witness Luffy's Conqueror's Haki in their arena, with many warriors knocked unconscious by the burst.
keyMoments.significance: The Kuja learn that Luffy possesses the same rare power as their empress, causing them to view him differently.

keyMoments.description: Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold demonstrate their Devil Fruit powers and Haki mastery in combat against Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Kuja's combat prowess and their mastery of Haki, establishing them as formidable fighters.

trivia: The Kuja Pirates are unique in being an all-female crew.
Many Kuja warriors can imbue their arrows with Armament Haki.
Their captain, Boa Hancock, is one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
